fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: Optional title for the code block

fields.name: showLineNumbers
fields.label: Show Line Numbers
fields.description: Display line numbers in the code block

fields.name: copyButton
fields.label: Show Copy Button
fields.description: Display a copy button for the code

fields.name: type
fields.label: Callout Type
fields.description: The type of callout to display

fields.name: content
fields.label: Content
fields.description: The main content of the callout

fields.name: icon
fields.label: Custom Icon
fields.description: Optional custom icon (emoji or icon name)

fields.name: title
fields.label: Gallery Title
fields.description: Optional title for the image gallery

fields.name: link
fields.label: Link
fields.description: Optional link when image is clicked

fields.name: columns
fields.label: Columns
fields.description: Number of columns for grid layout

fields.name: lightbox
fields.label: Enable Lightbox
fields.description: Allow clicking images to view in lightbox

fields.name: searchable
fields.label: Searchable
fields.description: Add search functionality to the table

fields.name: type
fields.label: Video Type
fields.description: The type of video to embed

fields.name: url
fields.label: Video URL
fields.description: URL of the video (for YouTube, Vimeo, etc.)

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.label: Custom Thumbnail
fields.description: Custom thumbnail image for the video

fields.name: width
fields.label: Width
fields.description: Width of the video in pixels

fields.name: height
fields.label: Height
fields.description: Height of the video in pixels

fields.name: source
fields.label: Source
fields.description: Where the quote is from (book, article, etc.)

fields.name: showQuotes
fields.label: Show Quote Marks
fields.description: Display quotation marks around the quote

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.label: Background Color
fields.description: Background color for the quote block

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
